vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προσωπο-ληπτέω,
(see. πρόσωπον 1.1) to be a respecter of persons, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to show favoritism, partiality favor
show partiality, favouritism Jas. 2:9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: favorecer ; mostrar favoritismo, tratar a una persona mejor que otra
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: có tôn trọng người; nể mặt. Xem G4381
